pr_title: Check for task name correctly so that ErrorProne runs.

timeline.bodyText: @mernst You added this method, should we just delete it? Or suppress the warning?
timeline.author: smillst
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -235,6 +235,7 @@ public UnderlyingAST getUnderlyingAST() {
      * @param cur a block whose successors to retrieve
      * @return a Deque of successor Blocks
      */
+    @SuppressWarnings("UnusedMethod")

replies.bodyText: I deleted it in d5d9069; a bad merge brought it back in a741394.  I have deleted it again.
replies.author: mernst

timeline.message: getSuccessors has been made an instance method on Block
